data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Jessica was disappointed when her boyfriend failed to propose during their tropical vacation. She ____ been ____ that ____ was ____ to ____ the ____, ____ she ____ expecting a ring ____ they ____ to a fancy ____. When no proposal was forthcoming at the restaurant, she felt incredibly let down and distraught.
data.partBlankContent: Jessica was disappointed when her boyfriend failed to propose during their tropical vacation. She h__ been cer____ that h_ was ab___ to p__ the ques____, a__ she w__ expecting a ring wh__ they we__ to a fancy din___. When no proposal was forthcoming at the restaurant, she felt incredibly let down and distraught.
data.answer: 杰西卡的男朋友在他们的热带度假期间没有向她求婚，这让她很失望。她确信他会向她求婚，她期待着他们去参加一场盛大的晚宴时，他会给她一枚戒指。当餐馆里没有人向她求婚时，她感到非常失望和心烦意乱。
